input_text:
Job Title: Casino Game Presenter (Customer Service Alternative) up to $25/hr. FULL BENEFITS

Location: Atlantic City, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Public Relations, Writing/Editing

Description:
Job Description

Join Evolution as a Game Presenter!

Are you service-oriented and seeking a unique career opportunity? At Evolution, your presentation skills and personality take center stage as you present our casino games live on-camera. If you've never dealt before, don't fret!

Here's what you can anticipate:

Evolution Academy Training: Start with us, and you'll undergo two weeks of thorough training at our Evolution Academy. Learn the ropes of our core casino games and hone your on-camera presentation skills.Work Schedule: Our studio operates 24/7 so preparedness for evenings, weekends, and holiday shifts is essential.


Who We're Looking For:

Individuals who are professional, mature, and understand the importance of workplace guidelines.Those with a strong service mindset and excellent communication abilities.Responsibility and dedication not just to the role but to team collaboration.The ability to engage and offer a memorable experience for our live players.Quick learners who adapt seamlessly to new concepts.


Qualifications

Must be 18 years of age or older.Must be able to obtain a NJ Gaming License.Required to successfully complete a pre-employment background check.Must wear assigned uniforms and maintain professional appearance standards.At least one year of experience in customer service or hospitality is preferred.Responsible, dedicated, and dependable.


Additional Information

Additional Information

Evolution is a market-leading developer and provider of products and services for online casino entertainment. Our excellence is driven by over 18,000 EVOlutioneers across 30 markets worldwide, working in product innovation, software development, IT solutions, game hosting and business support. Evolution's dynamic and creative environment creates a unique opportunity for personal and professional growth.

Our integrated business-to-business solutions guarantee that our clients can always provide an unrivalled online entertainment experience to their players globally. We thrive on remaining an award-winning digital powerhouse of entertainment products and services with an ever-expanding line-up of product brands: Evolution Live, NetEnt, Red Tiger, Ezugi, Big Time Gaming, Nolimit City and DigiWheel.

#EVONJH

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

job_responsibilities: Customer service or hospitality experience preferred
Ability to engage and offer a memorable experience for live players
